message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.  I'm asking for $15,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below my asking price.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for this product. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between our previous offers?
